loopRoutine.comment: Default variable name is the name of the property, so we use that in LABEL below

info.name: Collude for Food
info.attribution:
Game layout, library image, and scripting by Robin Harn, released to the Public Domain under CC0.

The following graphics are from http://www.freepik.com and are used under the Freepik license: 
https://www.freepik.com/free-vector/organic-flat-summer-background_13994728.htm

All food icons are from Google Noto Color Emoji and are used under the SIL Open Font License: https://fonts.google.com/noto/specimen/Noto+Color+Emoji
info.description: Be the first to eat all your food, and create temporary alliances to force opponents into trashing their food.
